description.raw:
Several fixes to gazebo windows compilation:

* Fixes to ignition transport compilation in windows

* Include ign-transport directories in utils

* Support for ignition-transport2 in cmake (already done for gazebo7 in other PR)

* Added support for ignition-msgs to configure.bat

* Fix paths for ignition packages

* Implement qwt windows detection

The [test build reached about the 60%](http://build.osrfoundation.org/view/All/job/gazebo-ci-pr_any-windows7-amd64/903/console) and found problems with ign-msgs. That will go in other PR.

  • Support for ignition-transport2 in cmake (already done for gazebo7 in other PR)

  • Added support for ignition-msgs to configure.bat

  • Fix paths for ignition packages

  • Implement qwt windows detection

The test build reached about the 60% and found problems with ign-msgs. That will go in other PR.
